Type Method# updateEquipment(_:state:context:)

visionOS 2.0+

```
static func updateEquipment<E>(
    _ equipment: E,
    state: E.State,
    context: UInt64 = 0
) -> Self where E : Equipment, E.State == CardState
```

Available when `Self` is `UpdateEquipmentAction<CardState>`.## [See Also](/documentation/tabletopkit/tabletopaction/updateequipment(_:state:context:)-6kawf#see-also)
